title: Rajputana Polki Jhumka - A Royal Fusion
materials: Pink Tourmaline Drop. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: Exquisite craftsmanship featuring a square motif inlaid with a ruby border and a central polki diamond. Adorned with surrounding polki diamonds in a petal-like arrangement, complemented by delicate emerald bead accents above. A teardrop Pink Tourmaline gracefully dangles below. The unique setting highlights the natural brilliance of the polki diamonds and offers a royal appeal. Features a delicate design inspired by traditional Rajput jewelry with a South Indian touch.
colors: and the ethereal white of the uncut Polki Diamonds.
occasions: traditional Telugu ceremonies like seemantham or half-saree functions
and also suitable for adding a touch of elegance to modern evening wear.
description: This stunning Polki Jhumka seamlessly blends traditional Rajput design with South Indian craftsmanship. The use of uncut polki diamonds highlights their natural beauty and creates a regal look. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting brilliance, making this a cherished piece for generations. The intricate detailing and vibrant color combination make it a true statement piece.
